TopicTitle: Disable reaction wheels in command pods

Articles.Content:
If you also think, that reaction wheels in KSP are overpowered and cheaty, it's easy to disable RW in command pods, but leaving RW as standalone parts for building spacestations, which really have RW

 

@PART[*]:HAS[@MODULE[ModuleCommand]]
{
        !MODULE[ModuleReactionWheel] {}
}
 

 

Edited March 11, 2021 by VladTs
I think lowering it’s power rather than removing all together would be better, well for me anyway (although I don't mind the stock values myself).
If you don't have reaction wheel power, how do you execute precision burns prior to developing RCS without physics exploits to make the craft start rotating?

Its easy to do with stock controls, doesn't need an Add On anyway.

They're overpowered because KSP is a game, not a real-life simulation.
